title: Imam Jafar as Sadiq (as) - other form
text: As-salāmu ʿalayka yā ḥabla Allāhi al-matīn
Jaʿfar ibn Muḥammad, khāzin al-ʿilm, ad-dāʿī
Allāhumma kamā jaʿaltahu maʿdina kalāmika wa waḥyika, wa khāzina ʿilmik
wa lisāna tawḥīdik, wa wāliya amrik
wa mustaḥfiẓa dīnik, faṣalli ʿalayhi afḍala
mā ṣallayta ʿalā aḥadin min awṣiyāʾik
